content: भवनं [भू-आधारे ल्युट्] {@--1@} Being, existence. {@--2@} Production, birth. {@--3@} An abode, residence, dwelling, mansion; अथवा भवनप्रत्ययात् प्रविष्टोस्मि <ls>Mk. 3</ls>, <ls>Me. 32.</ls> {@--4@} A site, abode, receptacle; as in अविनयभवनं <ls>Pt. 1. 191.</ls> {@--5@} A building. {@--6@} A field. {@--7@} Nature.
